Name: 孤独行者
About the game: The following is a description in English: The game is an adventure game about the world is attacked by the army of magic things, the protagonist is sent to the town below to find against the army of magic things, through the NPC to get clues to complete a task to find the Terran holy sword, so as to defeat the army of magic things, each task has a weak hint, do not worry about not doing the task. You HAVE YOUR OWN HEALTH AND STRENGTH BAR, AS well AS MANA, HEALTH can be REPLENISHES with DRINK MEDICINE, attacks require STRENGTH, AND THE STRENGTH bar can be automatically regenerated. The game play is parkour, stealth, combat and other gameplay. The operation is also convenient: w is to go forward, s is to go backward, a is to go left, d is to go right, ctrl is to squat, shift is to accelerate sprint, riding, dismounting, dialogue and other interactions can be used with e key, f is to hook and lock, 1 KEY IS TO PICK UP THE MELEE WEAPON, 2 KEY is to drink medicine, 3 key is TO pick up the long-range weapon, 4 key is to shout mount, the left MOUSE button is to attack, the right mouse button is to block
